1.name: Striking Features
1.description: Agent Romanova delivers a tactical series of strikes she first learned at the Black Widow Ops program.

2.name: Graceful Barrage
2.description: Black Widow displays the agility and grace of a ballerina, with the precision and devastation of a ninja.

3.name: Widow's Bite
3.description: She may look harmless enough, but this Black Widow has a shocking bite.

signature.name: Ignore Pain
signature.description: Natasha Romanova is conditioned to resist pain, giving her a chance to endure a lethal blow.

description: There’s no escaping the sting of the world’s greatest spy when she has you in her sights. A skilled fighter possessing astounding agility and a way with weapons, she is often shrouded in mystery. But there’s no mystery as to who you want on your team when things start heating up – Natasha Romanova – The Black Widow!
